relationships.description: Black cut off Pettigrew's front paw (finger).
Sirius was accused of murdering Pettigrew, but it is revealed that he was the Potters' Secret-Keeper.
Dumbledore gave evidence to the Ministry that Sirius had been the Potters' Secret-Keeper, which implies he also gave evidence against Black.
Professor Lupin is mentioned as being related to Sirius, but the exact nature of their relationship is not specified.
